summary: A bat file that gives you Nightingale armor and other items.
descriptionHtml:
It gives you Nightingale armor, A dragon priest dagger w/ paralyze and absorb health enchant, a ring w/ dragonhide (80% damage reduction on you) enchant and Backstab, And a necklace w/ Regen health and fortify sneak enchant. Also adds 10000000 gold. To activate go to the console (~ key) and type in \"bat soladox\" but with out the quotation marks. First \"mod\" so I dont really care what you rate me, if you suggest a item to spawn, I\'ll think about putting it in the file.There is a bug with the ring, It will say your armor has 0 rating at a workbench and in your inventory, Take it off and It will fix this.

V 1.1 Added Nightingale Bow, Nightingale Blade, Mehrunes Razor, and Skeleton key for the full Thief assassin effect.
author: assassinsftw78
